name: TC-74 | Sending OTP with missing language code
fullName: TC-74 | Sending OTP with missing language code

steps.name: task clearOtpData, {query: DELETE FROM OTP WHERE TRUNC(CREATEDON) = TO_DATE('2025-05-07', 'YYYY-MM-DD')}
log Using updated OTP data from environment
request ("{ method: 'POST', url: '/api/v1/otp/send', body: Object [Object: null prototype] { sendOtpRequest: [Object] }, failOnStatusCode: false }")
assert expected **{ Object (status, error, ...) }** to have property **status**

parameters.name: actual

steps.name: assert expected **{ Object (status, error, ...) }** to have property **status** of **ERROR**
assert expected **{ Object (status, error, ...) }** to have property **error**

parameters.name: actual

steps.name: assert expected **{ Object (code, message, ...) }** to have property **code**

parameters.name: actual

steps.name: assert expected **{ Object (code, message, ...) }** to have property **code** of **ERR_OTP_0001**
assert expected **{ Object (code, message, ...) }** to have property **message**

parameters.name: actual

steps.name: assert expected **{ Object (code, message, ...) }** to have property **message** of **Failed to send OTP. Please try again.**

parameters.name: actual
parameters.value: Failed to send OTP. Please try again.

parameters.name: expected
parameters.value: Failed to send OTP. Please try again.
